Description.English: Preferred Goods are traded at normal price, but for 60t per hour you get *2/*3/*4 of the price credited as bonus, also counts for passive trades! This way the profit you can make by selling them is limited to reduce exploits.
Description.German: Bevorzugte Güter erzielen normale Preise, aber für 60t pro Stunde erhaltet Ihr das 2/3/4-fache des Erlöses als Bonus obendrauf, gilt auch für den passiven Handel! Auf diese Weise sind Profite durch bevorzugte Waren limitiert ,was exploits reduziert.

KnownIssues.English:
The mod uses lua code. And it is not possible to save information in lua. Thats why the limit resets every time you load a savegame or enter from the main menu a game. Only way to save info would be with my WIP Ultra-Lua-Helpers mod, but its a heavy workaround.
 In addition when you have active trade menu with a neutral trader opened, the current reached limit can only be shown while your camera hovers over his island.
